description: The unique identifier of the issue.
The identifier of the person who created the issue.
The timestamp indicating when the issue was created.
The category of the issue, such as Bug or Story.
A detailed explanation of the issue.
The current status of the issue (e.g., Active, Resolved).
The level of impact the issue has: 1-Critical, 2-High, 3-Medium, 4-Low.
Comments or discussions related to the issue.
The action taken to resolve the issue.
Other issues that are linked or related to this issue.
The team responsible for resolving the issue.
The software version affected by the issue.
The system or service impacted by the issue.
The person responsible for managing the issue escalation process.
The release version associated with the issue.
